name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE CONCERT】J-RAP in JIGOKU! + NEW 3D MODEL REVEAL! #JRAPinJIGOKU [dN7gTC10XLE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence with title animation and background music.
Mori Calliope narrates a story about her past while walking through a stylized cityscape.
Live performance of the song "Yofukashi no Uta" on a traditional Japanese castle stage.

subtitles.original: It was music that brought me to this country.
subtitles.english: It was music that brought me to this country.

subtitles.original: In the undulating whirlwind of life,
subtitles.english: In the undulating whirlwind of life,

subtitles.original: it's only normal to seek some place you belong.
subtitles.english: it's only normal to seek some place you belong.

subtitles.original: ...and that place you belong is often underscored by...
subtitles.english: ...and that place you belong is often underscored by...

subtitles.original: ...a thing that you like.
subtitles.english: ...a thing that you like.

subtitles.original: A thing that draws you in and gives you an identity.
subtitles.english: A thing that draws you in and gives you an identity.

subtitles.original: But I had obligations. Ya know, stuff to do.
subtitles.english: But I had obligations. Ya know, stuff to do.

subtitles.original: Stuff I HAD to do.
subtitles.english: Stuff I HAD to do.

subtitles.original: It's funny how liking one thing can lead to loving another thing.
subtitles.english: It's funny how liking one thing can lead to loving another thing.

subtitles.original: That was the case with me, actually.
subtitles.english: That was the case with me, actually.

subtitles.original: Walking around, confused, bored...
subtitles.english: Walking around, confused, bored...

subtitles.original: Lost, I guess.
subtitles.english: Lost, I guess.

subtitles.original: And then, just like that- there's a moment where...
subtitles.english: And then, just like that- there's a moment where...

subtitles.original: ...it clicks.
subtitles.english: ...it clicks.

subtitles.original: It clicks, and suddenly, you're different.
subtitles.english: It clicks, and suddenly, you're different.

subtitles.original: Different in some way you can't explain.
subtitles.english: Different in some way you can't explain.

subtitles.original: Huh?
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: Oh! Where are you...?
subtitles.english: Oh! Where are you...?

subtitles.original: A rabbit hole appears before you.
subtitles.english: A rabbit hole appears before you.

subtitles.original: And you see how far it takes you.
subtitles.english: And you see how far it takes you.

subtitles.original: ガキの頃から夜が好きだった
subtitles.english: I've loved the night since I was a kid

subtitles.original: 9時に寝るのはなんか嫌だった
subtitles.english: I hated having to sleep at 9 o'clock

subtitles.original: なんとなくただ勿体なかった
subtitles.english: It somehow felt like a total waste

subtitles.original: 甘いこと案外知りたかった
subtitles.english: I actually wanted to know the sweet secrets

subtitles.original: エーイ いわゆる散漫なトーク
subtitles.english: Hey, call it scatterbrained small talk

subtitles.original: 投げ売りテレビみたいなサマートーク
subtitles.english: Like summer talk on a bargain bin TV

subtitles.original: 広く もっと深く
subtitles.english: Wider, and even deeper

subtitles.original: 12 o'clock から五月雨時まで
subtitles.english: From 12 o'clock 'til the early summer rain

subtitles.original: 初めてお前を跨いだのは
subtitles.english: The first time I straddled you

subtitles.english: I was just a child who knew nothing

subtitles.english: For now, everything is so new

subtitles.original: 注がれた形にその香り
subtitles.english: Into the poured shape and its scent

subtitles.original: 吸い込まれてった

subtitles.original: 手招きされるままに
subtitles.english: Just as I was beckoned

subtitles.original: それからお前は音楽を教え
subtitles.english: Since then, you taught me music

subtitles.original: 女の肌もなめさせてくれた
subtitles.english: And let me taste the skin of a woman

subtitles.original: 飲んだことねえ酒に口付けて
